DOC.brief_summary: The purpose study test whether treatment CYT003-QbG10 improve asthma symptom patient allergic bronchial asthma . The active treatment compare placebo .
DOC.criteria: Persistent allergic asthma bronchial require longterm treatment inhale corticosteroid Further criterion define study protocol Use oral corticosteroid within past 3 month Hospitalization asthma exacerbation within past 6 month Uncontrolled asthma Contraindication study test procedure Further criterion define study protocol
